headline: PV Power commissions Nhon Trach 3&4 gas-fired power plant in Vietnam
summary: Equipped with 9HA.02 gas turbines, the LNG-fired Nhon Trach 3&4 plant is expected to help meet rising power needs in southern Vietnam.
